heading: HB04009
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR AN INTEGRATED NATIONAL BAMBOO AND RATTAN DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM, ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE BAMBOO AND RATTAN CENTERS, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04009
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR AN INTEGRATED NATIONAL BAMBOO AND RATTAN DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM, ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE BAMBOO AND RATTAN CENTERS, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLARICA, HENRY R.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Silverio (000 2019-11-19)2. Rivera (000 2020-06-16)
3. Tambunting (000 2020-06-16)4. Villanueva (E.) (000 2020-06-16)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-01
          -The Committee approved HBs 1274, 3309, 3373, 3469 and 4009 adopting HB 3469 as reference bill. The Secretariat was directed to prepare a substitute bill, subject to style, incorporating amendments proposed during the meeting.
      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2019-12-09
      3. Transmmitted to the Committee on Ways and Means on 2019-12-09
      4. Scheduled for Deliberation by the Committee on Ways and Means on 2020-01-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-08-27
